Just got back 3 rolls of B&W film, editing down and working in photoshop now... should be on the photoblog pretty soon.
WATCHING OVER THE EDGEEEEE
Shared: Ambling Alp by Yeasayer - Most psychadelic, interactive website ever: Shared by Pseudoplacebo &a.. http://tinyurl.com/yhoku79
Opening doors. Shutting doors.
I feel so worthless.
A job like this would be ideal for me: http://transparencyjobs.com/jobs/95/
http://twitpic.com/q5vy4 - Sad doggy =[
Dad's hogging the studio. I'm ridiculously tired. Internet isn't working right.
Home now.
Numb3rs in math class. Everyone is talking though.
Band teacher was playing reich. I was ashamaed I didn't recognize.
I wanna be warm. =[
Found a calculator from school on my shoe. Uh.
Gonna shower, make some tea, and then sink into bed.
Worked out a bit, gonna do homework soon. Currently reading "Guide to Military Operations Other Than War" on Google books.
It is time for homework. Social Studies and Math tonight, english in the morning. Gym tomorrow. Yuck.
Just woke up. Feeling alright. Need to do some homework. Feeling dehydrated again. Wonder what that's about...

commits.message: docs: Add complete screen and feature walkthrough
feat: Add linguistic zooming test (800→300 words with 5 variations)
feat: Add multiple variations feature for article trimming
feat: Improve article trimming accuracy from 70% to 94%
test: Comprehensive LLM feature testing with real OpenAI API
Merge pull request #261 from colindm/copilot/sub-pr-258
feat: Track real play time instead of simulation time
feat: Convert AI layout system to structured JSON output
feat: Add AI Layout Strategist with streaming orchestration
feat: Integrate prompt system into real trim workflow
test: Add comprehensive testing and demo for prompt system
feat: Add context-aware prompt system with streaming transparency
feat: Add state-of-the-art OpenAI integration with agent orchestration
docs: Update root README to document complete NewsWell suite
feat: Add complete WordPress-backed Issue workflow with schema validation
refactor: Remove competing pagination system (delete-driven development)
fix(projects): move projects.vue to projects/index.vue for proper routing
fix(projects): prevent nested scrollbars in prose content
fix: Add bottom padding to save list for breathing room
fix: Make save previews responsive for small screens
fix: Prevent button overflow in save previews with flex-wrap
feat(Footer): replace social text with icons
refactor(Footer): lowercase all links for consistency
Fix: Enable scrolling in escape menu + add reset translations
Merge feat/ai-summarization-iteration: Bring back NewsWell Studio
refactor(Footer): improve consistency and spacing
refactor(projects): clean up TOC - remove heading, add separation
refactor: Simplify workspaces to single left sidebar layout
fix(projects): align TOC padding with other sidebar items
fix(projects): normalize TOC spacing for consistency
fix(lint): eliminate ALL linting errors! (226 → 221, 0 errors!)
feat: Add professional workspace-based UI structure (Phase 1-3)
Fix: Enable vertical scrolling in SaveSettingsPanel
i18n: Add maxAutosaves translations (SHORT)
fix(lint): resolve linting errors (274 → 226)
UI: Compress save preview vertical space
perf(animations): fix all out-of-range animation timings
Refactor: Replace grid grid-flow-col with flex in saveMenu
Refactor: Replace grid layouts with flexbox in LoadSavePage
feat: Add InDesign auto-labeling tool with one-click integration
UI: Fix save menu layout and remove 'Your Metro System' label
feat(interactions): apply interactive classes site-wide + 300ms timing
feat: Implement frame-label auto-assignment algorithm
refactor(Footer): apply interactive-link to all footer links
refactor(BentoProjectCard): use centralized interactive-card class
feat(global): centralized touch-friendly interaction system
refactor(predictions): remove remaining transition-colors
refactor(predictions): remove transition-base throughout
refactor(gear): remove borders, hovers, and transitions
refactor: Remove stats feature - keep PR focused on core bug fixes
refactor(gists): remove hover states
refactor(stats): remove transitions and hover states
refactor(footer): remove border and hover states
style: Run prettier on autosave refactor files
refactor(projects): remove borders and hovers per Tufte
fix: Establish single source of truth for autosave settings in Electron store
feat(projects): add brutalist metadata-rich header
feat(projects): add dense maximalist metadata display
feat(projects): add subtle seed-based card rotations
refactor(projects): use semantic nav element for TOC
docs: Complete NEWSKICK architecture blueprint
refactor(projects): simplify BentoProjectCard classes
feat(projects): use modern CSS Grid auto-fill layout
refactor(projects): remove redundant container nesting
refactor(projects): use centralized useProjectSlug composable
feat(composables): add useProjectSlug with github-slugger
